001package imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.filter.linear.Kernel2D;
004import imagingbook.lib.util.ParameterBundle;
005
006public interface TschumperleDericheF {
007
008        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
009                
010                @DialogLabel("Number of iterations")
011                public int iterations = 20;     
012                
013                @DialogLabel("dt (Time step)")
014                public double dt = 20.0;                
015                
016                @DialogLabel("Gradient smoothing (sigmaD)")
017                public double sigmaD  = 0.5;
018                
019                @DialogLabel("Structure tensor smoothing (sigmaM)")
020                public double sigmaM  = 0.5;
021                
022                @DialogLabel("Diffusion limiter along minimal variations (a0)") //small value = strong smoothing
023                public float a0 = 0.25f;        
024                
025                @DialogLabel("Diffusion limiter along maximal variations (a1)") //small value = strong smoothing
026                public float a1 = 0.90f;
027                
028                /** The alpha value applied in the first pass. */
029                @DialogHide
030                public float alpha0 = 0.5f;
031                
032//              /** Set true to apply the filter in linear RGB (assumes sRGB input) */
033//              public boolean useLinearRgb = false;
034        }
035        
036        static final float C1 = (float) (2 - Math.sqrt(2.0)) / 4;
037        static final float C2 = (float) (Math.sqrt(2.0) - 1) / 2;
038        
039        // TODO: move outside
040        static final float[][] Hdx = // gradient kernel X
041                {{-C1, 0, C1},
042                 {-C2, 0, C2},
043                 {-C1, 0, C1}};
044        
045        static final float[][] Hdy = // gradient kernel Y
046                {{-C1, -C2, -C1},
047                 {  0,   0,   0},
048                 { C1,  C2,  C1}};
049        
050        static final Kernel2D kernelDx = new Kernel2D(Hdx, 1, 1, false);
051        static final Kernel2D kernelDy = new Kernel2D(Hdy, 1, 1, false);
052}
